Silencing of miR-21 sensitizes CML CD34(+) stem/progenitor cells toimatinib-induced apoptosis by blocking PI3K/AKT pathway. Leuk Res. 2015Oct;39(10):1117-24. doi: 10.1016/j.leukres.2015.07.008.
